content.raw:
Ok trying those instructions, I see `sudo apt-get install gazebo8` is installing these packages:
```
The following NEW packages will be installed:
  gazebo8 gazebo8-common gazebo8-plugin-base libarmadillo6 libarpack2 libbulletcollision2.83.6 libbulletdynamics2.83.6
  libdap17v5 libdapclient6v5 libepsilon1 libfreexl1 libgazebo8 libgdal1i libgeos-3.5.0 libgeos-c1v5 libgts-0.7-5 libgts-bin
  libhdf4-0-alt libignition-math3 libignition-msgs0 libignition-transport3 libkmlbase1 libkmldom1 libkmlengine1
  liblinearmath2.83.6 libminizip1 libmysqlclient20 libnetcdf11 libodbc1 libogdi3.2 libogre-1.9.0v5 libpq5 libproj9 libqwt-qt5-6
  libsdformat5 libsimbody3.5v5 libspatialite7 libspnav0 libsuperlu4 libtar0 libtinyxml2-2v5 liburiparser1 libxerces-c3.1
  mysql-common odbcinst odbcinst1debian2 proj-bin proj-data sdformat-sdf ttf-dejavu-core
```

But I do see `libignition-msgs0-dev` when I run `sudo apt-get install libgazebo8-dev`
```
The following NEW packages will be installed:
  comerr-dev krb5-multidev libavcodec-dev libavdevice-dev libavfilter-dev libavformat-dev libavresample-dev libavutil-dev
  libbullet-dev libbulletsoftbody2.83.6 libcurl4-openssl-dev libdap-dev libdapserver7v5 libfreeimage-dev libgazebo8-dev
  libgdal-dev libgeos-dev libgif-dev libgssrpc4 libgts-dev libhdf4-alt-dev libignition-cmake-dev libignition-math3-dev
  libignition-math4 libignition-math4-dev libignition-msgs libignition-msgs-dev libignition-msgs0-dev libignition-transport3-dev
  libjasper-dev libkadm5clnt-mit9 libkadm5srv-mit9 libkdb5-8 liblapack-dev libmysqlclient-dev libnetcdf-dev libogre-1.9-dev
  libpostproc-dev libpq-dev libprotoc-dev libqt5concurrent5 libqt5designer5 libqt5opengl5-dev libqt5test5 libqwt-headers
  libqwt-qt5-dev libsdformat5-dev libsimbody-dev libspatialite-dev libsqlite3-dev libswresample-dev libswscale-dev libtar-dev
  libtbb-dev libusb-1.0-0-dev libusb-1.0-doc libwebp-dev libwebpdemux1 libxerces-c-dev libxml2-dev libzmq3-dev qt5-qmake
  qtbase5-dev qtbase5-dev-tools qtchooser unixodbc unixodbc-dev uuid-dev
```

I am getting the same issue however. Not really sure what the issue is. I forgot I am changing the node version to 4.8.7 every time as well.

Ok trying those instructions, I see sudo apt-get install gazebo8 is installing these packages:

The following NEW packages will be installed:
  gazebo8 gazebo8-common gazebo8-plugin-base libarmadillo6 libarpack2 libbulletcollision2.83.6 libbulletdynamics2.83.6
  libdap17v5 libdapclient6v5 libepsilon1 libfreexl1 libgazebo8 libgdal1i libgeos-3.5.0 libgeos-c1v5 libgts-0.7-5 libgts-bin
  libhdf4-0-alt libignition-math3 libignition-msgs0 libignition-transport3 libkmlbase1 libkmldom1 libkmlengine1
  liblinearmath2.83.6 libminizip1 libmysqlclient20 libnetcdf11 libodbc1 libogdi3.2 libogre-1.9.0v5 libpq5 libproj9 libqwt-qt5-6
  libsdformat5 libsimbody3.5v5 libspatialite7 libspnav0 libsuperlu4 libtar0 libtinyxml2-2v5 liburiparser1 libxerces-c3.1
  mysql-common odbcinst odbcinst1debian2 proj-bin proj-data sdformat-sdf ttf-dejavu-core

But I do see libignition-msgs0-dev when I run sudo apt-get install libgazebo8-dev

The following NEW packages will be installed:
  comerr-dev krb5-multidev libavcodec-dev libavdevice-dev libavfilter-dev libavformat-dev libavresample-dev libavutil-dev

  libjasper-dev libkadm5clnt-mit9 libkadm5srv-mit9 libkdb5-8 liblapack-dev libmysqlclient-dev libnetcdf-dev libogre-1.9-dev
  libpostproc-dev libpq-dev libprotoc-dev libqt5concurrent5 libqt5designer5 libqt5opengl5-dev libqt5test5 libqwt-headers

  qtbase5-dev qtbase5-dev-tools qtchooser unixodbc unixodbc-dev uuid-dev

I am getting the same issue however. Not really sure what the issue is. I forgot I am changing the node version to 4.8.7 every time as well.
